channel.title: [508]: New death animation, or classic wilderness Animation (317)?
channel.description:
I'm thinking about which I should have as my death animation.
My 508 is a pking server, therefore I want it to feel as much as the old RuneScape wilderness as possible. Should I have the old animation or the New one?
I'd like your opinions if thats ok ;).
Thanks in advance.
